hypothesis_content.title: Memecoin Volatility Compression Breakout Pattern
hypothesis_content.statement: When top 5 memecoins (by volume) experience 3+ days of declining volatility (Bollinger Band width contraction >30%) during NEUTRAL regime, a volatility expansion breakout in the direction of the 4-hour trend will yield an average +12% move within 24 hours, with an 85% win rate for continuation moves.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Memecoins exhibit strong momentum characteristics during low-volatility periods in neutral markets, as retail traders await catalysts. Compression periods often precede explosive moves due to low liquidity and high leverage positioning.
entry_conditions: Memecoin basket (DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP, SHIB, BONK) 3-day BB width decline >30%
4-hour price breaks above/below 20-period BB with volume > 1.5x 20-period avg

exit_conditions.stop_loss: -7% return OR price reverses through 20-period MA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >4% move beyond BB within 4 hours OR reverses to close inside BB on 4-hour candle.
